code: export function capitalizeFirstLetter(string){return string.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+string.slice(1);}export function validateEmail(email){var re=/^(([^<>()[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+(\.[^<>()[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+)*)|(".+"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/;return re.test(String(email).toLowerCase());}export function checkBlank(field){var re=/^\s*$/;return re.test(String(field).toLowerCase());}
